content: please note this listing is for a digital knitting pattern bundle pdf downloads no finished items are included you will receive patterns for all three designs upon purchase the woven collection hood cowl & hat a trio of super-bulky knitwear pieces built around the same sculptural interlaced texture designed to be worked quickly but look dimensional each piece is written with clear instructions suitable for an advanced beginner/intermediate knitter included patterns woven hood a structured silhouette with allover texture woven cowl dense and cozy perfect for everyday wear woven hat a quick textured beanie- great for gifting yarn & needles all three patterns are written for super bulky 6 yarns- each pattern is designed to use one full ball of yarn recommended hand-dyed yarns for maximum texture and depth needles vary slightly by design but generally include 16 circulars in us 15 10 mm 24 circulars in us 17 10 mm dpns for shaping as needed skill level advanced beginner/intermediate familiarity with knitting in the round basic shaping and knitting from a chart perfect for personal use gifting or building a matching winter set pattern details written in english u s knitting terminology clear fully written instructions instant digital download you are welcome to sell finished items made from these patterns please credit agnus dei woolens as the designer when listing or posting online these patterns and photos are for personal use only please do not copy alter distribute or share the files due to the digital nature of this item all sales are final
